name: Hollywood Movie Star Life Simulator
description:
(AD FREE) Start as an aspiring actor and climb your way to the A-List! Audition for roles, negotiate pay, hire agents, invest in films! Will you be the next MOVIE STAR?! 

===================

Less than 1% of aspiring actors make it to the A-List! Will your movies break box office records? Will your TV show be renewed next season? Do you have what it takes to make the cut and leave a legacy?

• Star in commercials, student films, short films, TV series or feature films!

• Create showreels, apply to roles, and follow the journey from audition to syndication!

• Hire talent agents with exclusive access to the best roles in Hollywood but you'll have to get them a cut!

• Negotiate pay for movie sequels, and renewal seasons for hit TV shows!

• Hype up and promote your films with your fans and followers!

• Track your movie's box office gross and how many hours your TV shows are streamed!

• Build your income overtime through syndication, residuals and royalties!

• Hire managers to invest in movies and land endorsement deals!

• Hire security to keep your belongings secure (coming soon)!

• Blow your wealth on massive properties and cars

•.Compete on global leaderboards
